news.title: Apple Drops 20% This Year
news.description: Apple’s (NASDAQ: AAPL) stock is down 20% this year. It was the company with the top market capitalization at the start of the year. At $3 trillion today, it is now behind Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT). Soon, it could fall behind Amazon (N…

news.title: The Latest Debt Downgrade Is Our Shot At Cheap 9% Dividends
news.description: This latest US debt downgrade is a buying opportunity for us contrarians. I say that because we had the same (profitable) setup the last three times.
